price: Moo samiifi dachii uuman? Lakki, isaan hin dhugoomsanu.
arabic: أَمۡ خَلَقُواْ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِنُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: am khalaqū al-samāwāti wal-arḍa bal lā yūqinūna
